key_points: Melania Trump has been keeping a low profile, focusing on relaxation and staying away from politics since leaving the White House.
Her daily routine at Mar-a-Lago involves going to the spa, having lunch, and dining with her family.
Melania Trump is in the process of setting up an official office and plans to continue her Be Best campaign.
She has expressed bitterness and regret over the events following the January 6 insurrection and her departure from Washington.
Melania Trump had the lowest favorability ratings of any modern first lady upon leaving office.
She decided against making a public statement condemning the January 6 Capitol riot, fearing backlash from either side.
Disappointed by the way she left Washington, Melania has shown resentment towards Donald Trump and is upset about her tarnished image.
Melania Trump has taken note of the attention her successor, Jill Biden, is receiving and contrasts it with her own approach as first lady.
Despite feeling overlooked by the media, Melania Trump turned down multiple offers for interviews and magazine features during her time as first lady.
Melania Trump is now questioning her media strategy but places the blame on others rather than herself.
spokespersons: Stephanie Winston Wolkoff (former senior adviser to Melania Trump)
